name: OMSI Map Parameter File
summary: Learn about .HOF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HOF files must be included in the vehicle model folder in order for the vehicle to be playable with a map. The HOF file is located in the vehicle model folder, which can be found in the following directory of the OMSI 2 Steam game installation, which is typically the following directory:

description: An HOF file is a file used by OMSI The Bus Simulator, an omnibus driving simulation program. It contains information that defines the parameters for how a bus can be driven on a map.
